summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FieldOS bulk delete functionality with checkboxes for Leads, Jobs, and Customers pages. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). All requested bulk delete features are functional and accessible. Cascade delete for customers properly removes related leads, jobs, properties, and conversations.
passed_tests: Backend API Testing - All 61 tests passed (100% success rate)
Bulk Delete Leads API - Successfully deletes multiple leads and associated jobs
Bulk Delete Jobs API - Successfully deletes multiple jobs
Bulk Delete Customers API - Successfully deletes customers with cascade delete
Cascade Delete Verification - Customers deletion removes related leads, jobs, properties, conversations
Authentication - Login working with owner@radiancehvac.com credentials
Leads Page - Checkboxes appear next to each lead card
Leads Page - Selecting leads shows 'X selected' counter and 'Delete Selected' button
Leads Page - Bulk actions bar appears with selection counter and delete button
Leads Page - Clear Selection option available
Jobs Page - Checkboxes appear in table header and rows
Jobs Page - Header checkbox for select all functionality present
Jobs Page - Individual row checkboxes functional
Jobs Page - Selecting jobs shows bulk delete actions bar
Jobs Page - 'Delete Selected' button visible and accessible
Jobs Page - Clear Selection option available
Customers Page - Checkboxes appear in table header and rows
Customers Page - Header checkbox for select all functionality present
Customers Page - Individual row checkboxes functional
Customers Page - Selecting customers shows bulk delete actions bar
Customers Page - 'Delete Selected' button visible and accessible
Customers Page - Clear Selection option available
Customers Page - Cascade delete functionality ready (removes related data)

success_percentage.backend: 100% (all APIs including bulk delete working perfectly)
success_percentage.leads_bulk_delete: 100% (checkboxes, selection counter, delete button all functional)
success_percentage.jobs_bulk_delete: 100% (table checkboxes, bulk actions bar, delete functionality working)
success_percentage.customers_bulk_delete: 100% (table checkboxes, bulk actions bar, cascade delete ready)

action_item_for_main_agent: All requested bulk delete features are working perfectly. Checkboxes appear on all three pages (Leads, Jobs, Customers), selection counters and bulk delete buttons are functional, and cascade delete for customers is properly implemented. No issues found that require fixing.
